text:
Since my previous patch emails to the ant-dev list were skipped over, probably 
lost in the mess, I figure I should post my patches here, in sections.

This first one fixes the > to be > in the documentation where ever it is not 
appropriate to have >. (outside a HTML tag)
creator: larry.shatzer@mirotechnologies.com
